title: 3 ways to make flying more climate-friendly | Ryah Whalen
itunes:author: Ryah Whalen
description: Air travel opens our eyes to the world, but it also comes at a high cost to the environment. Piloting us into a future of green aviation, innovator Ryah Whalen shares three ways to lower the industry's carbon footprint through smarter designs, eco-friendly fuel and new technology -- so we can continue to explore the planet without hurting it.
itunes:subtitle: 3 ways to make flying more climate-friendly | Ryah Whalen
itunes:summary: Air travel opens our eyes to the world, but it also comes at a high cost to the environment.
